ohu kimata yana deya gana indiyawa thula balapora udayan mudranalayata gini thabimen uthurata dena prajathanthrawadaye tharama pilibimbau wenawa udayan mudranalayata gini thabimen uthurata dena prajathanthrawadaye tharama pilibimbau wenawa - janatha wimukthi peramuna aanduwa uthure janathawata labadimata yana balahathkari prajathanthrawadaye tharama udayan mudranalaya gini thabima magin pilibimbau karana bawa janatha wimukthi peramuna puwathpath ejapayen 'peramuna' shrilanipayen 'sinhale' 'sama samajaya', mahajana eksath peramune 'peramuna' eksath jathika pakshaye 'siyarata' nila puwathpath da mathiwarana samaye alewi wuye warthagatha mattameni.
